branchCategory.name: Ball Screw Drive
branchCategory.description: The LEP family of actuators includes two series, the LEPY rod type and LEPS slide table type. Each is built around the same motors, drives and bodies, with the LEPS differentiated by the attachment of a slide table and linear bearing. Each model is lightweight, less than 1-1/2 lb, and compact enough to fit in the palm of your hand.

branchItem.name: LEPY, Electric Actuator Miniature Rod Type, Step Motor (Servo/24VDC)
branchItem.description: The LEPY is a rod type electric actuator with a miniature form factor, small enough to fit in the palm of your hand! The series includes two body sizes with inline mounted motors. Maximum stroke is 75mm, and maximum work load is 2 kg, or 50N pushing force depending on the application.
branchItem.bullets:
<UL> <LI>Body sizes: 6, 10 <LI>Strokes: 25, 50, and 75 mm <LI>Mounting : Side ( through or tapped), bottom tapped, axial tapped <LI>Motor cable entry selectable from 4 directions <LI>Basic and compact motor sizes available for size 10
</LI></UL>

branchItem.name: LEPS, Electric Actuator Miniature Slide Table Type, Step Motor (Servo/24VDC)
branchItem.description: The LEPS electric actuator fits a linear guide and work table to the LEPY miniature rod model. The result is an actuator with parallel and perpendicular work surfaces, able to resist offset moment loads and rotational forces. The series includes two body sizes with inline mounted motors. Maximum stroke is 75mm, and maximum work load is 2 kg, or 50N pushing force depending on the application.
branchItem.bullets:
<UL> <LI>Body sizes: 6, 10 <LI>Strokes: 25, and 50 mm <LI>Mounting : Side ( through or tapped), bottom tapped <LI>Motor cable entry selectable from 4 directions <LI>Basic and compact motor sizes available for size 10 <LI>Workpiece can be attached to top or front of table
</LI></UL>
